item.title: Weekly Movie: Day 0
item.description:
this is more just to have a first post tbh… but ig ill explain what im gonna doooo and stuff

the plan :3

1. watch a new movie every week

I’ve been wanting to watch more movies, but i just never have the motivation / energey / time to do so. and even when I do i usualy just rewatch a movie ive liked from the past

so, as part of my yearly goal, im gonna try to watch a movie ive never seen before every week ( i’ll still re-watch movies and write about them but the goal is to watch a movie ive never seen before, for every week )
